subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mike Weir won for the first time since early in the 2004 season, shooting a two-under 68 for a one-stroke victory over Mark Hensby in the Fry’s Electronics Open in Scottsdale, Ariz.Weir secured the victory with a 6-foot par putt after hitting his approach on the par-4 18th into a greenside bunker.
